channel.title: Looking for an Awesome server source
channel.description:
I'm looking to start a community, and a place for players to stay, hangout, and do some good ol' killin.
Doesn't have to be fancy or anything, just something that is stable, and can hold a crap load of players, and is PK based.

item.title: Looking for an Awesome server source
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Hai Oh Hai
item.description:
@Oh_Hai wrote:

The best source is the one you make or at least edit largely on your own. Look through the Server Downloads category and pick a good source out. Usually comes with a client.

And learn by slowly manipulating the code inside; eg

sendMessage("Welcome to Runescape");

change to something like;

sendMessage("Welcome to *your server name* Have fun!");

Most people wouldnt reply to a thread like this because it’s considered leeching if you just change the name. You have to change almost everything to make it your own.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for an Awesome server source
